title: Best Pedagogical Paper Award
description: This work highlights the transformative potential of Virtual Reality in agricultural education and its role in inspiring tech-driven entrepreneurship.

title: Featured on University Website for VR in Education Research
organization: North Carolina A & T State University, 2025
description: Awarded for pioneering VR-based research in agricultural education, developing immersive simulations through 3D modeling, photogrammetry, LiDAR data integration, and interactive environment design to deliver realistic, skill-focused training experiences.
